Package controller

Interface ScientificControllable

All Known Implementing Classes:
ScientificDBImplementation
public interface ScientificControllable
Interface that defines the operations controllable by a scientist.

  • Method Details

    • showAsignedSCP

      ArrayList<SCP> showAsignedSCP(String id) throws exceptions.ServerException
      Shows the SCPs assigned to a specific scientist.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the scientist
      Returns:
      a list of SCPs assigned to the scientist
      Throws:
      exceptions.ServerException - if an error occurs on the server

    • showInfo

      Worker showInfo(String id) throws exceptions.ServerException
      Shows the information of a specific worker.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the worker
      Returns:
      the worker's information
      Throws:
      exceptions.ServerException - if an error occurs on the server

    • createWorker

      void createWorker(Scientific sci) throws exceptions.ServerException
      Creates a new worker using the data of a scientist.
      Parameters:
      sci - the scientist from which to obtain the data to create the worker
      Throws:
      exceptions.ServerException - if an error occurs on the server

    • modifySCP

      boolean modifySCP(SCP scp) throws exceptions.ServerException
      Modifies an SCP.
      Parameters:
      scp - the SCP to modify
      Returns:
      true if the modification was successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      exceptions.ServerException - if an error occurs on the server
